description:
This is a snippet of json from the extensions list response:

      {
           "alias": null,
           "description": "Start/Stop instance compute API support",
           "links": [],
           "name": "ServerStartStop",
           "namespace":
"http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/servers/api/v1.1",
           "updated": "2012-01-23:00:00+00:00"
       }

Notice that alias is null. All extensions should have an alias.
title: ServerStartStop extension has no alias
